The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 November is 1,401,792 (2,490.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 25 November, there were 94,435 new confirmed cases (167.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 November, there were 135,490 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (41,055 fewer cases).
